column4: :( this is not 'linux for human beeings' ... it sucks ... i never had a problem like this with debian fedora or windows ... verry dissapointing :(
Debian, Fedora and Windows are all still available.  Go for it :P
This isn't the "I Didn't RTFM" channel... toodles :P
Yeah, my ex's wifi worked perfectly from the LiveCD but took hours of Google and tweaking to get it to work after installing.... weird, huh?
That's what I thought.  It should be the other way around if anything.
